textPlain: From kidney transplant surgery to typeface design... he's probably the only person on the planet with such a trajectory.
RIP Chris. I will use your font faces in my next project in your honour.
Wow, that's sad. I've switched to Google's Sans font entirely and love it. RIP Chris.
Thank you for sharing this. He appeared to be a truly captivating and gifted individual. His untimely demise is a tragedy. Rest in peace.

Hack was a relatively minor improvement over DejaVu Sans Mono. Google Sans Code seems like a more deep rework, and I like it!It's sad that I learn about it only as the person who had worked on it passed away. RIP.
